### Species dominance {.tabset .tabset-pills}

#### All data points

```{r}

for(species_input in protist_species){
  
  print(ds_patches %>%
  filter(disturbance == disturbance_input) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = get(paste0(species_input, "_dominance")),
             y = bioarea_per_ml)) +
  geom_point() +
    labs(x = paste0(species_input, "_dominance")))
  
}
```
